ConfigItem.Name: CMDBExplorer::GraphOptions###LinkFontSize
ConfigItem.Description: Font size for the link labels (if displayed)

ConfigItem.Name: CMDBExplorer::GraphOptions###NodeFontSize
ConfigItem.Description: Font size for the node labels

ConfigItem.Name: CMDBExplorer::GraphOptions###DisplayLinksName
ConfigItem.Description: Whether links name should be displayed in the CMDB explorer graph or not

ConfigItem.Name: CMDBExplorer::GraphOptions###NodeShapes
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the shapes (eg: box, ellipse, none) that will be user for rendering nodes in the explorer graph. Values must be valid graphviz node shape (see dot's man page).

ConfigItem.Name: CMDBExplorer::GraphOptions###LinkStyles
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the styles (eg: filled, dotted) that will be user for rendering links in the explorer graph. Values must be valid graphviz edge style (see dot's man page).

ConfigItem.Name: CMDBExplorer::GraphOptions###LinkArrows
ConfigItem.Description: Defines which arrows must be drawn for links in the explorer graph. Values must be valid graphviz edge dir (see dot's man page).
